npc_output: It's cloudy in the morning, perfect for farming. |r1|
I'm feeling a bit sad and anxious, but I need to plant the healthy vegetable during harvest, |r1|.
I'm a bit bored, but I have to deliver this urgent message, |r3|.
It's just another day of mining, but I need to break the hidden gem before sunset, |r1|.
I could use some assistance with gathering the wild herb after rain, |r8|.
I'm a bit angry, but that's just my personality.
Actually, I need to prepare the festive banquet after sunset, |r1|.
I'm a bit anxious, but I have to load the salty voyage at the harbor, |r1|.
I need to hex the strange ritual at midnight, |r1|.
I'm happy to chat, but I also need to unlock the shadowy escape after curfew, |r1|.
